description: Component that displays a counter badge.

color.options: primary | info | success | warning | danger | secondary
color.description: The (background) color of the badge. Defaults to 'primary'.

count.description: The count to show in the badge. Defaults to 0 and badge will be hidden if count equals 0.

maxCount.description: The max count value to limit text inside badge. Defaults to 999.
